name: Tab Color Underscoring active/read/unr (pre 3.6)
description:
**** Firefox 29 and above should use style 101570 (101570) and must still install an experimental extension...
Firefox 3.6 through Firefox 28 users should use style 24728 (24728) along with an experimental extension described there. **** Colors the bottom border of a tab with RED for active tab, BLUE for a normal tab, GREEN for a still unread tab. In other words distinguishes tabs as active tab, viewed tab, unviewed tab. Does not affect the background color of a tab so that color usage of "Perma Tabs" ("Perma Tabs Mod"), and/or "Multiple Tab Handler" extensions will prevail.
